newsitem.title: MEXICO: Altos Hornos de Mexico granted ISO-9002.
newsitem.headline: Altos Hornos de Mexico granted ISO-9002.

text.p: Mexican steelmaker Altos Hornos de Mexico obtained the respected International Standards Organization (ISO) 9002 quality certification for two of its product lines, said the newspaper El Diario de Monterrey.

Certification was granted for cold-rolled steel and electroplated products after an audit undertaken September 5 and 6 by Societe Generale de Surveillance, a Swiss company specializing in international standards compliance.
In addition to the new certification, another eight of Altos Hornos' product lines already comply with the International Standards Organization, according to El Diario de Monterrey.
